[vc_column_text]“How do I know if my TEER NOC code is included in the BC PNP occupation list?”

In order to answer this question, you must decide whether you are applying for BC PNP Skills Immigration, Express Entry BC, or BC PNP Tech pathways for skilled workers. The following guide contains the updated BC PNP occupation list 2022 for each British Columbia Provincial Nominee Program.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”BC PNP Occupation Categories” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1669113182503{padding-top: 40px !important;}” el_id=”apply-for-visitor-visa”][vc_column_text]Most of the skilled workers apply for the BC PNP Skills Immigration stream. The stream is further divided into occupation-based programs. Additionally, there are some priority occupations under the BC PNP. These BC PNP occupation categories are given below:

  • BC PNP Skilled Worker
  • BC PNP Health Authority
  • BC PNP Entry Level and Semi-Skilled
  • BC PNP International Graduate
  • BC PNP Tech
  • BC PNP Priority Occupations
  • Express Entry BC

Let’s discuss the eligible occupations for BC PNP Skills Immigration Stream.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”BC PNP Skilled Worker Occupation List” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1669112781248{padding-top: 40px !important;}” el_id=”bc-pnp-skilled-worker”][vc_column_text]The occupation list for BC PNP skilled worker category is similar to the federal skilled worker program of the express entry system.

You must have at least 2 years of full-time (or equivalent part-time) work experience in any skilled occupation TEER 0, TEER 1, TEER 2, and TEER 3 shown below:

column_border_color=”#707070″ column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”Want to Immigrate through BC PNP?” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][nectar_btn margin_top=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”BC PNP Health Authrority Occupation List” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1669112799506{padding-top: 60px !important;}” el_id=”bc-pnp-health-authority”][vc_column_text]BC PNP Health Authority is a special category under British Columbia PNP for health care professionals. This stream is open to any occupation. Additionally, to apply under this stream you must have a full-time, indeterminate, and permanent job offer from one of the B.C. public health authorities. You can contact Health Match BC for free recruitment services.

You may also like: BC PNP High Demand Occupation List 2022[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”BC PNP Entry-Level and Semi-Skilled Occupation List” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1669112819184{padding-top: 60px !important;}” el_id=”bc-pnp-semi-skilled”][vc_column_text]The occupations that qualify under the BC PNP Entry-Level and Semi-Skilled Category (ELSS) are listed below:

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”BC PNP International Graduate Occupation List” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1669112836524{padding-top: 40px !important;}” el_id=”bc-pnp-international-graduate”][vc_column_text]This BC’s Provincial Nominee Program (PNP) is designed for international students who hold a degree or diploma from a Canadian institution. Any occupations under TEER 1, TEER 2, or TEER 3 are eligible under BC PNP International Graduate Category. You can check the out in the BC PNP Skilled Worker occupation list table above.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left” css=”.vc_custom_1669112161367{margin-top: 10% !important;}”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][image_with_animation image_url=”12474″ animation=”Fade In From Right” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”1px” column_border_color=”#707070″ column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

BC PNP Calculator 2023

Check your SIRS points using our Free BC PNP Score Calculator.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”none” text=”Check Score” url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/bc-pnp-points-calculator/” margin_top=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”BC PNP Tech Occupation List” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1669045904389{padding-top: 40px !important;}” el_id=”bc-pnp-tech-occupations”][vc_column_text]BC PNP Tech was introduced in 2017 as a pilot program to assist with the high demand for labor in the technology sector of British Columbia. Due to its success, the province decided to make it a permanent part of Skills Immigration. All the eligible BC PNP Tech occupations are listed below:

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”BC PNP Priority Occupations” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1669113062203{padding-top: 40px !important;}” el_id=”bc-pnp-other-priority-occupations”][vc_column_text]The province of British Columbia urgently needs more early childhood educators and healthcare professionals. To fill these positions BC organizes separate BC PNP Draws for the targeted priority occupations. These occupations are divided into the following categories:

  • Healthcare Occupations
  • Childcare occupations
  • Other priority occupations

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Express Entry BC Occupation List” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1669113080540{padding-top: 40px !important;}” el_id=”express-entry-bc”][vc_column_text]When the BC Provincial Nominee Program (BC PNP) was introduced by IRCC in 2015, it was aligned with Express Entry. The Express Entry BC (EEBC) allows eligible applicants to receive priority in the processing of their applications for the BC PNP. The following streams are eligible for BC PNP Express Entry:

  • EEBC Skilled Workers
  • EEBC Health Authority
  • EEBC International Post Graduates
  • EEBC International Graduates

The eligible occupations for the BC PNP Express Entry categories are the same as the corresponding Skills Immigration categories. For example, occupations eligible for the BC PNP Skilled Worker category of skills immigration are also eligible for the EEBC Skilled Worker category.

You must also be eligible through one of the three federal immigration programs to apply through Express Entry BC. These programs are Federal Skilled Worker Program, Federal Skilled Trades Program, and Canadian Experience Class.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Need help?” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1655824044795{padding-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]If you are planning to move to Canada through the BC PNP you can contact our experts here. Our team is led by Keshav Sharma, a licensed and regulated Canadian Immigration Consultant with many years of experience. We will help you with your BC PNP Immigration process and permanent residence.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-4-percent” column_padding_tablet=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”left-right” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”4/12″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_raw_html]JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJtbC1mb3JtLWVtYmVkJTIyJTBBJTIwJTIwZGF0YS1hY2NvdW50JTNEJTIyMzgxOTE0NiUzQWIyYzNtMHIxYzklMjIlMEElMjAlMjBkYXRhLWZvcm0lM0QlMjI1NDY1NDI2JTNBdTJ4Mms4JTIyJTNFJTBBJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNF[/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Trending Stories” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1644853159092{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][recent_posts style=”list_featured_first_row” columns=”1″ category=”all” order=”DESC” orderby=”date” image_loading=”default” blog_remove_post_date=”true” blog_remove_post_author=”true” blog_remove_post_comment_number=”true” blog_remove_post_nectar_love=”true” posts_per_page=”5″ post_offset=”1″][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: BC PNP Occupation List 2023 will help you find the New TEER NOC code and relevant British Columbia Provincial Nominee Program that fits your profile.
